item.description:
WHEN: 2 hours starting at the posted time

THE SCENE: That area of MA is very scenic around now.  I drove by the dam last week and the trees are very emotional.  While I've never been to the dam, I've heard from residents that it is scenic, and surrounded by easy trails.  I hope to do a couple of hours of art, and later take some time to hike the trails.

SPECIAL CONSIDERATIONS: Small-sized groups demand flexibility, so please check your email the day of the event to ensure it is still on.  Often, when there is just myself or one other I cancel or change the time of an event, to suit the small group's needs.


WHERE TO MEET*: Because i haven't been there, best case is to send your cellphone so we can stay in touch the day of the event.  Second to that, if you take the turn into the dam, we should be located at the first scenic spot.

RSVP POLICY: If there are 3 or less artists RSVPd for the event, the event is subject to cancellation within 12 hours of the event. We apologize for any inconvenience.

DIRECTIONS: Route 20 just out of Sturbridge Center.  Hard to miss.  There is a big sign for it.

THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
                        Mosquito repellant,  Paper towels,  Sweater, water, food

IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

CONTACT:
Michael Emerald, CFA
Organizer
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.how_to_find_us: East Brimfield Dam, Route 20, Sturbridge MA
item.name: PLEIN AIR OUTING: East Brimfield Dam, Sturbridge MA
